mapper.select: SELECT ID, PICTURE, ALB_NAME, ART_NAME, RELEASE_AT, GENRE FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY RELEASE_AT DESC) AS RN, ID, PICTURE, ALB_NAME, ART_NAME, RELEASE_AT, GENRE FROM ALBUM WHERE RELEASE_AT BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE+7) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM (SELECT ID FROM ALBUM WHERE RELEASE_AT BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE+7)
SELECT * FROM ALBUM WHERE ID IN(SELECT ALBUM_ID FROM MUSIC WHERE ID IN (SELECT MUSIC_ID FROM WISHLIST_MUSIC WHERE WISHLIST_ID=#{id}))

SELECT ID, ALB_NAME, ART_NAME, PICTURE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, ID, ALB_NAME, ART_NAME, PICTURE FROM ALBUM WHERE UPPER(ALB_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} AND RN <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ALBUM WHERE UPPER(ALB_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')
SELECT * FROM ALBUM WHERE ID = (SELECT ALBUM_ID FROM MUSIC WHERE id = #{id})
SELECT * FROM ALBUM WHERE ID = ( SELECT ALBUM_ID FROM MUSIC WHERE ID = (SELECT MUSIC_ID FROM WISHLIST_MUSIC WHERE WISHLIST_ID=#{id} AND ROWNUM=1))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALBUM (ID, ALB_NAME, ART_NAME, RELEASE_AT, GENRE, CONTENT, PICTURE, ARTIST_ID) VALUES (album_seq.nextval, #{albName}, #{artName}, #{releaseAt}, #{genre}, #{content}, #{picture}, #{artistId})
mapper.select: SELECT AL.ID, AL.ALB_NAME FROM ALBUM AL, ARTIST A WHERE A.ID = AL.ARTIST_ID AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
